titles.title: I will sing unto the Lord as long as I live

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
I will sing unto the Lord
As long as I live
I will sing praise to my God
While I have my being
My meditation of Him shall be sweet
I will be glad I will be glad in the Lord

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise ye the Lord)
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise ye the Lord)
Bless Thou the Lord oh my soul
Praise ye the Lord
(Praise the Lord)
